dabaosword.shifttooltip: Press shift down for more info
item.dabaosword.gudingdao.tooltip1: Those who encroach upon the territory of Wu will surely be vanquished!
item.dabaosword.gudingdao.tooltip2: Deals double damage to entities not wearing equipment
item.dabaosword.rattanarmor.tooltip: Wearing it makes one buoyant in water and impervious to arrows and blades
item.dabaosword.peach.tooltip2: Can be used on entities while sneaking
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip: With King Fuchai's Water Army, three thousand strong crossbows shoot the tide low. ——Su Dongpo
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip6: I have plenty of arrows ready!
item.dabaosword.arrowrain.tooltip7: No shortage of arrows, only enemies yet to die.
item.dabaosword.too_happy: Too Happy to Think of Home
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip: In this moment of joy, one forgets home
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip1: Inflicts 10 seconds of 'Too Happy to Think of Home' effect upon hit
item.dabaosword.too_happy.tooltip2: Affected creatures cannot move and regular attack can't work.
item.dabaosword.steal.tooltip1: Randomly obtain one card from the opponent's inventory
item.dabaosword.steal.tooltip2: “效马效羊者右牵之”  ——《礼记·曲礼上》
item.dabaosword.discard.tooltip1: Randomly discard one card from the opponent's inventory (will disappear immediately!)
item.dabaosword.discard.tooltip2: “你休得顺水推船，偏不许我过河拆桥”  ——康进之
item.dabaosword.shan.tooltip: Initiates a forward dash upon use, grants 0.5 seconds of invulnerability, 1-second cooldown
item.dabaosword.jiu.tooltip: Card-form wine, added for uniformity; grants Strength II for 15 seconds upon use
item.dabaosword.wuzhong.tooltip2: All things sprang from something. Something sprang from nothing.  ——《Tao Te Ching》
item.dabaosword.wuxie.tooltip1: Passively defends against cards like Too happy, Steal and so on.
item.dabaosword.wuxie.tooltip2: Exploit their laxity, exploit their emptiness.  ——Cao Cao
item.dabaosword.huogong.tooltip: Where there's fire, there's a reason; where there's smoke, there's a cause.  ——Sun Tzu
item.dabaosword.juedou.tooltip: For 15 seconds, remain still without worrying about attacks from others
item.dabaosword.bingliang.tooltip: Man may be made of iron, but not eating leaves one famished
item.dabaosword.bingliang.tooltip2: Affected players remain weakened until two Draw Card are removed
item.dabaosword.jiedao.tooltip: Obtains the main hand item of the opponent
item.dabaosword.yiji.tooltip: If your health is 12 or below, draw two cards
sounds.dabaosword.jiedao: Borrow a Knife to Kill: use
sounds.dabaosword.lebu: Too Happy to Think of Home: use
